author: leloso
title: Amazing hotel
text:
Stayed at the Park Plaza for 5 nights
the hotel is located in the very heart of Beijing, close to shopping, food, metro..
the great service starts from the time you are greeted by the doorman and goes all the way.
Check in was super quick, staff smiley and super helpful.
The room was huge, overlooking the Jinbao street
modern, stylish
the best super comfortable,
Bathroom huge and equipped with all amenities!
Breakfast was amazing, so much to chose from.. from Local Asian to international foods.. amazing coffee, fresh fruit..
Sweet staff at the restaurant
the hotel has a small fitness room...
free drinking water is provided daily by the hotel..
great service... great hotel
will certainly use again and certainly recommend
